widgets-desc:
Allows wiki administrators to add free-form widgets to the wiki by editing pages within the {{ns:widget}} namespace.
Community-contributed widgets can be found on [http://www.mediawikiwidgets.org/Main_Page MediaWikiWidgets.org]
right-editwidgets: Create and edit [https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/Extension:Widgets widgets] in the {{ns:widget}} namespace
group-widgeteditor.css: /* CSS placed here will affect widget editors only */
group-widgeteditor.js: /* JS placed here will affect widget editors only */
widgets-config-useflaggedrevs: Set this to true to use FlaggedRevs extension's stable version for widget security
widgets-config-compiledir: Set a default directory for storage of compiled templates
